column6: The rarest of beasts - a used rocket. Controlled landing not easy, but done right, can look easy. Check out video: https://t.co/9OypFoxZk3
Breakthrough Energy Coalition. When in a box, only way out is to invent your way out. Thx to @BillGates for pulling this together.
What 400 very happy rocket scientists look like. https://t.co/FwrZHuB8RD
Finally trashed by @realDonaldTrump. Will still reserve him a seat on the Blue Origin rocket. #sendDonaldtospace https://t.co/9OypFoxZk3
Congrats @SpaceX on landing Falcon's suborbital booster stage.  Welcome to the club!
Grail: Risky, but if works, big breakthrough in broad spectrum EARLY cancer detection. Brilliant scientists. https://t.co/CmGslKGLOV
Is Yegi on the plane? #JasonIsFree
Wheels up and out of Iranian airspace! Jason, Yegi, and Mary aboard. Doug Jehl and Ali Rezaian worked tirelessly on this. #JasonIsFree
Believe me, if you’re ever tossed in a foreign prison, you want Fred Ryan and Marty Baron on the team working to get you out. #JasonIsFree
Impressive launch and @SpaceX will soon make Falcon 9 landings routine – so good for space! Kudos SpaceX!
Can a used rocket fly? Video + a few technical details at https://t.co/8JUKBLg8fi  https://t.co/JWpi3yGDWq
Nice. Blue Origin team just nominated for time-honored aviation award, the Collier Trophy! All the nominees here: https://t.co/PvGu1PI9TW
Mr. Prime Minister @matteorenzi, we are so proud of Diego. Great for Italy. Kudos to all! https://t.co/Mk0jcTZ2gT
Hope, somewhere in space-time, Einstein is seeing this. https://t.co/6EMJgffrIs #LIGO
Marty's piece today is so inspiring. Thank you, @PostBaron! #BadAssReporting https://t.co/pVkjdXm97y
James Hamilton’s retrospective on 10 years of AWS is excellent: https://t.co/NL8GFMjvdz Kudos and congrats to the whole team!
OK, this is the most hilarious Echo video yet: https://t.co/H6QJ28UYec
Got a little help from Amazon Robotics on stage today at our All-Hands in Seattle   https://t.co/8Ies2thPmr
Working to fly again tomorrow. Same vehicle. Third time. #LaunchLandRepeat @BlueOrigin https://t.co/e1ZfYAibK2
Pushing the envelope. Restarting BE-3 fast @ high thrust, just 3600 ft from ground. Impact in 6 sec if engine doesn’t restart & ramp fast.
Also, a new more efficient RCS algorithm on the Crew Capsule. Big performance win if it works. #LaunchLandRepeat @BlueOrigin
We’ll have drone cameras in the air and hopefully will get good aerial footage to share. #LaunchLandRepeat @BlueOrigin
Two university microgravity experiments on tomorrow’s @blueorigin flight. Short vids: https://t.co/lHW6lsqCAY  https://t.co/VAYuFJRk7H

Readying Crew Capsule for flt. Clear skies in TX.
Tracking for morning launch. #LaunchLandRepeat @BlueOrigin https://t.co/X22DBlf9ZE
Crew Capsule is locked & ready for flt. Tortoises mark successful CC missions. #LaunchLandRepeat @BlueOrigin https://t.co/akPaP9EFIu
Liftoff and New Shepard is climbing to apogee. @BlueOrigin

Flawless BE-3 restart and perfect booster landing. CC chutes
deployed. @BlueOrigin
CC touchdown confirmed. #LaunchLandRepeat @BlueOrigin
My Gradatim Ferociter boots. Gift from a friend & they brought luck today. #LaunchLandRepeat @BlueOrigin https://t.co/3szqLGMI7s
We’ll share mission video including aerial as soon as we’re able to get it processed.#GradatimFerociter @BlueOrigin
Video from yesterday's flight now live: https://t.co/vBvPYpGFrQ Great view of dramatic booster deceleration.
Heads up readers – all-new, top of the line Kindle almost ready. 8th generation. Details next week.
Thank you and congrats to my friends and colleagues Jeff and Andy – very well deserved! https://t.co/hGLGMDluKu
You counseled so many. Your wisdom and warmth will be remembered. Rest in peace Bill Campbell.
Champagne cracked in the newsroom today. Congratulations to all @washingtonpost on Pulitzers!
Ridiculously cute. #Alexa https://t.co/OG7g2cgIXS
Thank you @FLOTUS for all you do with @JoiningForces. We're excited to add 25K more @Amazon Warriors to our ranks. https://t.co/ZSZ2DInOhZ

Flight to test one-chute-out failure scenario & push envelope on booster maneuvers #GradatimFerociter https://t.co/oWIGMqMCoa
Replacing leaking O-ring in capsule’s nitrogen gas pressurization system. Rescheduling flight to Sunday. #GradatimFerociter
New Shepard launch set for Sunday at 10:15 am ET. Live webcast starts at 9:45 am ET at https://t.co/WTXblOKlvk #GradatimFerociter
Watching a rocket launch (and rocket landing!) might add a little extra fun w/ kids on Father's Day. #GradatimFerociter
Look for one-chute-out test starting about 7 minutes into flight + continue pushing envelope on booster. #GradatimFerociter
And of course – development test flight – anything can happen. #GradatimFerociter
Thanks @VirginGalactic! So agree space needs all of us. #GradatimFerociter https://t.co/nlJsbWSv20
Loading propellants. Looking good for this morning’s launch. #GradatimFerociter
Careful engineering plus of course … the lucky boots. Successful mission. #RocketsReused #GradatimFerociter https://t.co/ON5lhfGPSK
.@trailingjohnson Amazing experience. Thank you! https://t.co/Aj3J88eqrw
Bucket list. Cast, crew and Justin Lin @trailingjohnson were amazing. #StarTrekBeyond https://t.co/VJ95D8pQeK

.Thanks @TheRealBuzz & @HeinleinPrize – what a fun night! https://t.co/l73vz2W2Oc

RT @blueorigin: Weather no-go for tomorrow’s New Shepard #InFlightEscape test. Webcast now Wednesday 10:45 am ET. #GradatimFerociter
RT @blueorigin: Everything looking good this morning for #InFlightEscape. Live webcast at 10:45 am ET #GradatimFerociter
That is one hell of a booster. #InFlightEscape #GradatimFerociter https://t.co/7ZRRe2HnMO

Steering through violent MaxQ escape forces is a residual capability, not explicitly engineered. Just a very robust booster. #InFlightEscape
Stenciling the 7th and final tortoise onto this hardy and stalwart New Shepard capsule. #GradatimFerociter https://t.co/ciB6rbNPqP
Visiting Raisbeck Aviation High School today was so inspiring for me. Awesome students. https://t.co/zUGMXoNqLT
https://t.co/U6VjlywrI3
Congratulations to @realDonaldTrump. I for one give him my most open mind and wish him great success in his service to the country.
Long wait is over… Clarkson, Hammond, May are back… #TheGrandTour premieres tonight in UK, US, DE, JP. And globally in Dec. https://t.co/dfQjGGuDFW
Love this TV commercial for Amazon Prime. Very proud of our ad team. https://t.co/E8ceXs4nte
So proud of my brother https://t.co/qIRKtbamXs, and here’s his TED talk https://t.co/tYCodFJXoe.

Thank you, John Glenn. Godspeed.
The Spheres’ first snow… thanks @mAColors for the great pic https://t.co/WnOtTAixjU

I agree we need a superhighway in space. https://t.co/iEVk7nP3aA
RT @RoyPrice: Asghar Farhadi, @AmazonStudios understands and supports your decision not to attend the Oscars.

And on the NYPost article, if anybody knows how to get 20% margins in groceries, call me! :)
Love this story https://t.co/PwXQSZ9Xaw of not 1, but 4 couples, who met @ Amazon FC in KY. Love is in the air… Happy Valentine's day! https://t.co/rn3ctg98Qu
Excited to share our urban campus with this terrific organization @FareStart https://t.co/SNJkMK6hz5
#TheSalesman takes home the Oscar for Best Foreign Language Film. Well done Asghar Farhadi and team @AmazonStudios #Oscars
Bravo to Kenny Lonergan on his well-deserved #Oscars win for Best Original Screenplay @AmazonStudios @MBTSMovie
Congrats to Casey Affleck on his Best Actor win. So earned. #ManchesterByTheSea #Oscars @AmazonStudios @MBTSMovie

Impossible to express how personally meaningful this is. A dream. Huge kudos to @BlueOrigin team that worked so hard https://t.co/q2P0Lsi81U https://t.co/D56XNkIiBP

Thanks @TheRealBuzz! That cute little guy is the future! https://t.co/nx75sAUYW8
First plant in the ground at #TheSpheres, 39,999 to go. Public tours start 2018. https://t.co/6Jgo4cLb7o
I won the lottery with my mom. Thanks for literally everything, Mom. https://t.co/gEuVgxotdw
Super fun morning talking rockets with a very cool group of students. Great questions. Thx to all the students and to @museumofflight! https://t.co/adXbn3bdon
Congrats to Jeff on his long-term leadership. John, you have size 20 shoes to fill! GE remains an American gem. https://t.co/oFF4yp9J4e
Rooftop #solar panels at our 1 million-square-foot fulfillment center in Baltimore now live. 50+ solar FCs will come online by 2020. https://t.co/eUpoxZ0eTt

Flipping pancakes, Lego Saturn V, Wonder Woman matinee. Love being a dad. #FathersDay https://t.co/L9Q7zW1p0A

Amazing to share this moment with the @BlueOrigin team and my family. https://t.co/1fgM9jExs9
Terrific meeting with @narendramodi. Always impressed, energized by optimism and invention in India. Excited to keep investing and growing. https://t.co/xhQ58dik3y
This is a gigantic compliment to our teams. Best of luck Haggler in your continuing adventures. #CustomerObsession https://t.co/LyGg3aD5QM

Mike Collins cracking us all up last night. https://t.co/bnpHp0ZCK4

Awesome! Good luck this weekend @JimmyShane1! https://t.co/EFor5kuYLn
Couldn’t happen to a nicer guy. Congratulations @jeffreytambor! https://t.co/543RCTusqX
A pleasure to host #SecDef James Mattis at Amazon HQ in Seattle today https://t.co/JnQZoSOnFN
https://t.co/LvRG16ZhbF
Alexa has made a new friend https://t.co/r7o46eVJq0
.@Amazon supporting “30 Days, 30 Smiles” with @Accorg. Today, a surprise visit to @BlueOrigin. #BeatPediatricCancer https://t.co/RErtOuuJDm
Future engineer, 9-year-old Ryan, signs Amazon gold robot he helped build at another "30 Days, 30 Smiles" event #BeatPediatricCancer #GoGold https://t.co/EEpa50nNCI
Thoughts with all those affected in Las Vegas. So much gratitude to all the police & good Samaritans who put their lives on the line to help
Amazon plane packed with donation of critical supplies landed earlier today in San Juan. Thank you to all the Amazonians who made it happen. https://t.co/w3ksl0SP25
Long my favorite novel. Teaches pain of regret so well you will think you lived it. Congrats, Mr. Ishiguro, so earned! #NobelPrize https://t.co/VBOyLYlIIi
Fun day christening Amazon’s latest wind farm. #RenewableEnergy https://t.co/cTxeXdsFop
First hotfire of our BE-4 engine is a success. Huge kudos to the whole @BlueOrigin team for this important step! #GradatimFerociter https://t.co/0gk6k6WuPx
And the winner for best news website is … @WashingtonPost. And more. Big congrats to the whole team! #DMNA17 https://t.co/BtridtXjeM
Congrats to the @BestBuy team on their new Alexa skill. Customers can now find and shop Best Buy deals on Alexa. Nice! https://t.co/wWuvIkvgD1

Thank you to the 17,500 veterans and military spouses now working at Amazon. We set a goal last year to hire 25,000 of these leaders by 2021, and are on track to hire even more. #VeteransDay https://t.co/1tIiSZrRtQ
Thank you and your boys for your service, Casey! https://t.co/1OhL3D4ijJ
Amazon Prime heads to Middle Earth. https://t.co/QowUmf8t3S https://t.co/YVciEX3u2t
Ten years ago today, we launched the first-ever Kindle. Happy 10th birthday @AmazonKindle and thank you to all the Kindle readers and authors! https://t.co/qelfniBSK1
Of all the news coming out of AWS #reInvent this week, I hope you didn’t miss this one. Set a Guinness World Record for largest chicken wing eating competition! Nice! https://t.co/uSfmLOKTU0
#NewShepard had a successful first flight of Crew Capsule 2.0 today. Complete with windows and our instrumented test dummy. He had a great ride. @BlueOrigin https://t.co/PZHXWXjuw9

Full video of Mannequin Skywalker’s ride to space. Unlike him, you’ll be able to get out of your seat during the zero gee part of the flight. And ignore the pinging sound – it’s just from one of the experiments on this flight. #NewShepard @blueorigin https://t.co/dJ5VEeaWb6 https://t.co/qGQC1vfW7D
First use of our landing pad bot #Blue2D2. @blueorigin https://t.co/Ht2P7yVwEs
Turns out our Amazon fulfillment center associates in Madrid can dance… And one got a big surprise at the end! Love it! https://t.co/7MufxruSXe
Wishing best of luck tonight to THE MARVELOUS MRS MAISEL, Rachel Brosnahan, Kevin Bacon, and to the whole cast and crew of THE POST too! #GoldenGlobes https://t.co/UIJriZzmN6

The stunning Perito Moreno Glacier in Patagonia. We’ve sent robotic probes to every planet in this solar system. Earth is BY FAR the best one. We go to space to save the Earth. @BlueOrigin #NoPlanB #GradatimFerociter https://t.co/8esV18orcJ
Best of luck @SpaceX with the Falcon Heavy launch tomorrow – hoping for a beautiful, nominal flight! @BlueOrigin #GradatimFerociter
@elonmusk @SpaceX @blueorigin Woohoo! 🚀🚀🚀

Installation has begun—500 ft tall, all mechanical, powered by day/night thermal cycles, synchronized at solar noon, a symbol for long-term thinking—the #10000YearClock is coming together thx to the genius of Danny Hillis, Zander Rose & the whole Clock team! Enjoy the video. https://t.co/FYIyaUIbdJ
Happy to announce that Amazon Studios is adapting Iain M. Banks’ amazing Culture series — a huge personal favorite — as a TV series. Can’t wait! https://t.co/wgEmv65Pm3 https://t.co/NhCGUyRt2L
Kirk or Picard? Picard! #FinalFrontier #GoBoldly https://t.co/mEohTVuKIs

New test video of Blue’s 550K lbf thrust, ox-rich staged combustion, LNG-fueled BE-4 engine. The test is a mixture ratio sweep at 65% power level and 114 seconds in duration. Methane (or LNG) has proved to be an outstanding fuel choice. @BlueOrigin #GradatimFerociter https://t.co/zWV0jWXIvx
Thank you to the @NatReconOfc for having me over to speak. You don’t want to even imagine the world without these professionals doing the job they do. https://t.co/f3cHWbKwjq
Taking my new dog for a walk at the #MARS2018 conference. #BostonDynamics https://t.co/vE6CXrvV3o
Horrible and truly tragic day for YouTube and Google. We are wishing all our very best for the injured and all those affected.

I made pancakes on this rainy Seattle morning for @ciara and @DangeRussWilson. These guys are as fun as they are talented. Inspiring too. And Russ and I ate our weight in pancakes! #funfriends https://t.co/MWST7oXbVs
Very comfortable on my kids’ giant panda doing email and putting final touches on this year’s annual shareholder letter. About to take the kids to see Rampage... https://t.co/OrmMpV4VGj
I love Dwayne Johnson @TheRock. Still working on my smolder https://t.co/8GmuZIyFwK https://t.co/WyckQV6rrY

Great reporting requires patience, grit and a willingness to follow a story wherever it leads, whether Alabama or Moscow. Proud of @washingtonpost #Pulitzer winners! And big congrats to the @nytimes, as well! #DemocracyDiesInDarkness https://t.co/MBMWhh1cQR

At @BestBuy catching up with CEO Hubert Joly and announcing our collaboration on the next generation of smart TVs. Couldn’t ask for a better partner, and the product is killer. Full Alexa integration: “Alexa, watch ABC” or “Alexa, watch Westworld.” #FireTVEdition https://t.co/Dsq8VBOSA7
Honored to speak at @TheBushCenter Forum on Leadership tonight with Ken Hersh. The spirit of former First Lady Barbara Bush was very much felt at the event. https://t.co/E4TJR9KKs9

Dog sledding above the Arctic Circle in Norway. Jim Lovell says it’s not that you go to heaven when you die, but “you go to heaven when you’re born.” Earth is the best planet in our solar system. We go to space to save the Earth. @BlueOrigin #NoPlanB #GradatimFerociter #EarthDay https://t.co/q0Y9A4KSLm

Launch preparations are underway for New Shepard’s 8th test flight, as we continue our progress toward human spaceflight. Currently targeting Sunday 4/29 with launch window opening up at 830am CDT. Livestream info to come. @BlueOrigin #GradatimFerociter https://t.co/zAYpAGWB8C
Apogee of 351,000 feet (66 miles, 107 kilometers), and that’s the altitude we’ve been targeting for operations. One step closer. #GradatimFerociter @BlueOrigin
The lucky boots worked again. Huge kudos and thanks to the entire @BlueOrigin team. #GradatimFerociter https://t.co/P9cUqRNbYv
Highlights from today’s mission. Don’t miss the Nerf ball doing a few backflips in zero gravity. #GradatimFerociter @BlueOrigin https://t.co/YxlJRt0MXc
😀 @ConanOBrien @BlueOrigin https://t.co/x3BiCpaLQA
Love this quote. It’s been on my fridge for years, and I see it every time I open the door. #Emerson https://t.co/kN8HjM4bOI
You shaped us, you protected us, you let us fall, you picked us up, and you LOVED us, always and unconditionally. Thank you for everything. I love you, Mom. https://t.co/Z8YGMO55C9
Tom Wolfe was an amazing journalist and author. Thank you for showing us all what it took to have “The Right Stuff”. https://t.co/ObMeU4S92S

I’m enjoying this day with my kids but also remembering. Remembering the many sons and daughters who have given up their lives for us and for our sons and daughters. #MemorialDay #HireVets #HireMilitarySpouses https://t.co/mdSr0Ylapx
https://t.co/phDTXHElBp
My dad came here from Cuba all by himself without speaking English when he was 16 years old, and has been kicking ass ever since. Thank you for all the love and heart, Dad! https://t.co/nuavG0yEtM

Wishing @SpecialOlympics tennis competitor (and Amazonian!) Leonard Flowers luck in the @2018USAGames this week! Great event and we’re proud to be a presenting sponsor. #ChooseToInclude https://t.co/kx6igcmb6e

Crew Capsule looks great even after it was pushed hard by the escape test. Astronauts would have had an exhilarating ride and safe landing. Great engineering and the lucky boots worked again @BlueOrigin #GradatimFerociter https://t.co/ireJ3rWEvs
Appreciate the support, Mr. Vice President. I’m thrilled to report from West Texas that the team nailed it today #launchlandrepeat https://t.co/yiIB7zTtde
Super proud of the entire Blue Team who came together and made it happen #nevergetsold #gradatimferociter https://t.co/f6e2pdnwGn
https://t.co/2GlgjztK1u
Incredible work from the whole @MaiselTV team for 8 #Emmys wins, including Outstanding Comedy Series. Woohoo! https://t.co/mfAwDkVX6s

Big win for @BlueOrigin today! And a big thank you to @ulalaunch for choosing our BE-4 engine. Excited to be a part of Vulcan’s mission to space. #21stCenturyEngine #AllAmericanEngine #GradatimFerociter https://t.co/K0Szt3jesi
Thank you @SenSanders. We’re excited about this, and also hope others will join in. https://t.co/kasWkkOhWo

Thank you to the @usairforce for your confidence in the @BlueOrigin team and our #NewGlenn rocket. We are proud to serve the national security space community and are committed to providing safe, reliable access to space for the nation. #GradatimFerociter https://t.co/AeO3xXhnUi
Very sad to hear of Paul Allen’s passing. His passion for invention and pushing forward inspired so many. He was relentless to the end. My heart goes out to Paul’s family and friends.

Amazon just won The American Foundation for the Blind’s Helen Keller award! Huge kudos to the whole team on working so hard to make our products accessible to the vision impaired! @afb1921 https://t.co/qh6HkQkekB

Yep, that’s me. I was lucky to be exposed to tech and coding at a young age. Inspired a lifelong love of invention. I hope the new Amazon Future Engineer program does the same for some kids today. https://t.co/xNUdyVMOnb https://t.co/RPZEiIHSap

Had the privilege today of unveiling our newest Amazon Air 767 - "Valor" - named in honor of the thousands of Amazonian veterans and military spouses delivering for our customers every day. #VeteransDay #AmazonWarriors https://t.co/bKHDQgb1TN

Excited to announce the first annual grants from the Bezos Day 1 Families Fund. $97.5 million to 24 organizations doing needle-moving work on family homelessness. Congrats to the recipients – we know you’ll spend the money wisely and with heart. https://t.co/aF4Src09zC https://t.co/MMCil3l2cw

I have outstanding news to ring in 2019. Former Alexa VP & long-time Amazonian Mike George has agreed to lead the Day 1 Academies Fund. Mike is a true builder who knows how to start from scratch, and he’ll bring tremendous energy, grit, and passion to the job. Thank you, Mike! https://t.co/K01N1NZ8ag
https://t.co/Gb10BDb0x0

Grateful for the journalists at the @washingtonpost and around the world who do the work, no matter the risk or dangers they face.

Been an honor & pleasure having Tom Alberg on Amazon’s Board. Tom joined in 1996 and has been with us ever since - over 22 years. I’ll miss his sound judgment, deep well of business & life experience, and his quick wit. He's a smart business person and even better human. Thx Tom!
Congrats to the whole @blueorigin team! https://t.co/71S53Ucl5l
RT @blueorigin: Today, our founder shared our vision to go to space to benefit Earth. We must return to the Moon—this time to stay. We’re r…

Blue Origin is building the infrastructure needed to unleash the next generation of dreamers. I met these young people today, and the future is in great hands. #BlueMoon @clubforfuture https://t.co/F2zPM5PngM
I’m lucky enough to call her my mom. She’s kind, patient, supportive, and has always encouraged me to stay curious. Happy Mother’s Day, Mom! https://t.co/n1UZV3muZe

We’re investing $1.5 billion in our new air hub to get you your packages faster. Three million square feet, and it’s going to create 2,000 jobs. And if you’re guessing that driving a front loader was fun, you’re right! #amazon #prime https://t.co/Cud4orKrC4

At the Statue of Liberty, where my dad’s being honored with a Liberty Star as part of the new museum’s opening. At #COP26, Lauren and I discussed conservation of land and sea with leaders from Colombia, Ecuador, Panama, Costa Rica, and Bolivia. Together, they oversee one of the most diverse regions on earth. The @BezosEarthFund is working with them to help create the largest (1/2) https://t.co/6MQ2RsAQxC
(2/2) transnational marine protected area on the planet, covering an area larger than California. Thank you to this group for their boldness on this important work.
